combobox_eb_valueholder.name: condition
combobox_eb_valueholder.script: function onInit() super.onInit() addItems(DataCommon.conditions) add("evasion") add("improved evasion") add("CA") add("GRANTCA") end

combobox_eb_valueholder.name: creature_type
combobox_eb_valueholder.script: function onInit() super.onInit() add("") addItems(DataCommon.creaturetype) addItems(DataCommon.creaturesubtype) end
